name: 7-Eleven Gold Pass
description: 40% off ($5.99/month) Gold Pass membership for EBT/SNAP recipients, military/veterans, and college students (verify eligibility via mobile app under 'Community Discounts'); 30-day free trial for new customers
fullDescription: 7-Eleven is one of the world's largest convenience store chains. Their Gold Pass membership offers exclusive deals, rewards, and discounts on food, drinks, and everyday items.
whatTheyOffer:
- 40% off Gold Pass membership ($5.99/month instead of regular price)
- Available for EBT/SNAP recipients, military/veterans, and college students
- Exclusive member deals on food, drinks, and snacks
- 30-day free trial for new customers
howToGetIt:
1. Download the 7-Eleven app on your smartphone
2. Create an account or sign in
3. Go to 'Community Discounts' in the app settings
4. Verify your eligibility (EBT card, military ID, or .edu email)
5. Start your discounted membership
